summary: A washed-up writer forms an unlikely friendship with a teenager from Long Island.
cast: Lisa Kudrow|Jeff Daniels|Ryan Reynolds|Emma Stone|Kieran Culkin|Hunter Parrish|Eric Gilliland|Louis Rosario|Conrad Wolfe|Arabella Field|Chris Parnell|Brian T. Finney|Brian Patrick Russell|Jill Shackner|Violet O'Neill|Michael Heintzman
title: Paper Man
